Articles.Content:
I have 1.4.2 KSP.

I have a problem with too many messages in the right corner.I get dozens a messages about the determination of the contract parameter. In previous versions, this was not a problem. how to delete it. I tried to switch off Advanced Massage App but it does not change anything. I have specifically removed all MODS. Please help.

On 9.4.2018 at 9:45 PM, Zxy44 said:

Please help.

Stock bug.

You can use the mod Contract Configurator, which has a workaround.

KSP 1.4.3 should fix that bug.
